subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Midfielder Xabi Alonso scored in the 10th minute and Liverpool ended Chelsea’s 86-match home winning streak Sunday, 1-0. It was the first goal Chelsea had allowed in seven league and cup matches. Chelsea last lost at home in February 2004 to Arsenal.
